column4: while installing the driver i am getting this error "no precompiled kernel interface was found to match ur kernel ..... do u want serch for the kernel interface for ur kernel on the nvidia site"

while installing the driver i am getting this error "no precompiled kernel interface was found to match ur kernel ..... do u want serch for the kernel interface for ur kernel on the nvidia site" anyone knows wat is the problem even selecting yes gives me message that no kernel interface found
make sure you have Build-Essiential installed, gcc-3.4, and the kernel headers for your kernel
then just run it, when it sees that there is no precompiled interface it will offer to compile it
then just do this: export CC=gcc-3.4
then run the installer (sudo it of course)
thats what export CC=gcc-3.4 should do
If you closed the term you'll need to export again
